With your permission, I would like to gather some information about your handset. All I\'m gathering is the SDK (i.e. Cupcake, Froyo, Gingerbread) and a unique number preventing duplicate entries. That\'s it. Why? Because if nobody using this app is running 1.5 then I can drop support for it and use the newer features.\nCharts showing this information gathered will be made available on http://nmap.wjholden.com.
